summary: Two distant cousins meet at a wedding banquet for an elderly couple. Over time, a close friendship develops between them, but their spouses begin to think that they are more than just friends.
cast: Marie-France Pisier|Victor Lanoux|Marie-Christine Barrault|Guy Marchand|Ginette Garcin|Sybil Maas|Popeck|Pierre Plessis|Catherine Verlor|Hubert Gignoux|Françoise Caillaud|Véronique Dancier|Catherine Day|Carine Delamare|Maite Delamare|Emmanuel de Sablet|Alain Doutey|Pierre Forget|Anna Gaylor|Etoile Gómez|Marguerite Grimprel|Paul Handford|Marie-Paule Jourdan|Catherine Laborde|Sebastien Lebeaut|Gérard Lemaire|Annick Le Moal|Jan Madd|Suzy Marquis|Monique Martin|Ginette Tacchella|Dominique Migno|Rosine Rochette|Monique Saintey|Catherine Stermann|Philippe Yeziglian
title: Cousin cousine
